mapper.select:
SELECT board_no AS bno, board_title AS btitle, board_writer AS bwriter, board_hit AS bhit, board_heart AS bheart, board_pin AS bpin, DATE_FORMAT(board_updatetime,'%Y-%m-%d') as bupdatetime, idx AS idx FROM board
ORDER BY board_pin DESC, board_no DESC LIMIT #{skip}, #{amount}

SELECT board_no AS bno, board_title AS btitle, board_writer AS bwriter, board_content AS bcontent, board_hit AS bhit, board_heart AS bheart, board_pin AS bpin, DATE_FORMAT(board_datetime,'%Y-%m-%d-%H:%i') AS bdatetime, DATE_FORMAT(board_updatetime,'%Y-%m-%d-%H:%i') AS bupdatetime, idx AS idx FROM board WHERE board_no = #{bno}
SELECT board_no AS bno, board_title AS btitle, board_writer AS bwriter, board_content AS bcontent, board_hit AS bhit, board_heart AS bheart, idx AS idx FROM board WHERE board_no = #{bno}
